top_repos.name: ethrex
top_repos.description: Minimalist, fast and modular implementation of the Ethereum protocol in Rust. L1 and L2 execution client.

top_repos.name: cairo-vm
top_repos.description: cairo-vm is a Rust implementation of the Cairo VM. Cairo (CPU Algebraic Intermediate Representation) is a programming language for writing provable programs, where one party can prove to another that a certain computation was executed correctly without the need for this party to re-execute the same program.

top_repos.name: cairo_native
top_repos.description: A compiler to convert Cairo's intermediate representation "Sierra" code to MLIR.

top_repos.name: ethrex-replay
top_repos.description: Ethereum re-execution tool, powered by ethrex
